XXbsu058_u:1904: poṣadhavastu atra granthaḥ - "yaduktaṃ bhagavatā bhikṣuṇī bhiḥ
XXbsu058_u:1905: bhikṣūṇāmantike bhikṣuṇībhāvaḥ paryeṣitavyaḥ iti katamesāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ
XXbsu058_u:1907: tatsthānagatā vāsasthaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ upaniśritya bhikṣuṇīnāṃ vāsaḥ /
XXbsu058_u:1909: avavāda-anuśāsanīmārgaṇāt, na ca niśrayātikramo yuktaḥ ityetad vijñānam /
XXbsu058_u:1910: āvāsikatvamevātra viropitataratvena viśiṣyamāṇaṃ naivāsikatvaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate // (647) dhvaṃso bhavatvasya [utsṛ]ṣṭau // bhavadbhāvye bhavatvaṃ jāyamānatvamityarthaḥ /
XXbsu058_u:1911: gṛhyamāṇe saṃvare tasya saṃvarasya yadbhavatvaṃ tasya tadavasthasya utsṛṣṭau pratyākhyānādinā utsarge dhvaṃso bhavati /
XXbsu058_u:1913: na ca āneghasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ laṅghanādau dṛśyate /
XXbsu058_u:1915: saṃvarasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ iti yo manyeta tannābhinivṛttyartha etatsūtram /
XXbsu058_u:1916: muktakeṣu atra granthaḥ - "upasaṃpannastābat, upālin, gṛhitvaṃ pratijānāno anupasaṃpanno vaktavyaḥ /
XXbsu058_u:1917: prāgeva upasaṃpadya māna iti // pṛcchā prāyaṃ pravrajyāvastugatam //
